egocarib-mapmarkers:name: Name
egocarib-mapmarkers:not-saved-warning: Auto Map Marker settings not saved: Settings included invalid colors or names.
egocarib-mapmarkers:custom-gui-descripti: Configure hotkeys for these markers in the game settings menu (Esc > Settings > Controls).
egocarib-mapmarkers:copy-setting-to-all-: Copy Icon and Color from "{0}" to All
egocarib-mapmarkers:mark-style-interact: Mark map by interacting with object
egocarib-mapmarkers:mark-style-sneak: Mark map by sneaking while looking at object
egocarib-mapmarkers:show-chat-message: Show chat message when new map marker is added
egocarib-mapmarkers:include-coordinates: Include X,Y,Z coordinates in map marker labels
egocarib-mapmarkers:enable-custom-hotkey: Enable hotkeys to add customizable map markers
egocarib-mapmarkers:enable-delete-hotkey: Enable hotkey to delete nearest map marker
egocarib-mapmarkers:show-chat-message-on: Show chat message when nearest map marker is deleted
egocarib-mapmarkers:show-chat-message-ho: After enabling this option, you can configure hotkeys in game settings (Esc > Settings > Controls)
egocarib-mapmarkers:disable-mod: Temporarily disable the Auto Map Markers mod
egocarib-mapmarkers:re-enable-mod: Click to enable the Auto Map Markers mod
egocarib-mapmarkers:server-warning: Auto Map Markers mod was unable to connect to the server, and may not work as expected. If you are on a multiplayer server, the mod needs to be installed on the server to function.
